name: Ford Racing 2
synopsis: The sequel to Ford Racing has arrived.  Ford Racing 2 has new and improved cars, added tracks and challenges, and more thrills than ever.  With an expanded selection of Ford vehicles--ranging from the '49 Ford to the latest Mustang GT Concept--picking out a car will be a lot harder than you expect.  Get a feel for each car on a diverse set of tracks including Road Tracks, City Limits, Ovals, Spring Break, and Lost World.  Ford Racing 2 is ready to put you in the driver's seat, but are you daring enough to sit there?
